description: Building System can used to create level editors or terraria styled games, you can activate or deactivate any time.
name: TileBasedBuildingSystem
shortDescription: This building system allows you to create level editor type of games.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: this tile will be used to placed on scene.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: BuildableTile

parameters: Object.Behavior::PropertyBlockWidth() * round((MouseX() - Object.Behavior::PropertyExtraPaddingX() - Object.Behavior::PropertyBlockOffsetX()) / Object.Behavior::PropertyBlockWidth()) + Object.Behavior::PropertyBlockOffsetX()

Object.Behavior::PropertyBlockHeight() * round((MouseY() + Object.Behavior::PropertyExtraPaddingY() - Object.Behavior::PropertyBlockOffsetY()) / Object.Behavior::PropertyBlockHeight()) + Object.Behavior::PropertyBlockOffsetY()

eventsFunctions.name: IsTileSelected
eventsFunctions.sentence: if _PARAM0_ is selected - build is on

eventsFunctions.description: Avoid objects from overlapping in building process.
eventsFunctions.name: UnPlacable
eventsFunctions.sentence: Avoiding _PARAM2_ for overlapping _PARAM0_. (Disabled Icon: _PARAM3_ is Visible: _PARAM4_)

parameters.description: Group Should Avoid - Don't use this function more than one!
parameters.name: ObjectAvoid

eventsFunctions.description: Changes building mode of the tile.
eventsFunctions.name: ChangeBuildMode

eventsFunctions.description: check what is the Building mode.
eventsFunctions.name: GetBuildMode
eventsFunctions.sentence: If Building Mode of _PARAM0_  is equals to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Change the value of extra tile padding.
eventsFunctions.name: SetPadding
eventsFunctions.sentence: Extra tile padding of _PARAM0_ has changed (X:_PARAM2_, Y:_PARAM3_)

eventsFunctions.description: Set grid block size width and height.
eventsFunctions.name: GridBlockSize
eventsFunctions.sentence: Changed _PARAM0_ block width to: _PARAM2_ and height to: _PARAM3_

eventsFunctions.description: Set a group of area that can be placed.
eventsFunctions.name: BuildableArea
eventsFunctions.sentence: _PARAM0_ can only build to the area of _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Returns true if tile can't be placed.
eventsFunctions.name: IsProtected
